name: Motor Battle Arena
description:
Motor Battle Arena is a destruction derby where the only thing that counts is the who wins. Drive one of 4 race cars into victory. Crash into and destroy your friends. 

This 6-week student project was made as a collaboration between multiple people

Requirements:

In order to play this game you need a couple of Xbox controllers.

 Simply plug them into your PC and press play.

Motor Battle Arena  was created with Unreal Engine 4

The Team:

- Lead Level & Game Designer: Daniel Wood

- Producer, Level, Designer, Game Designer & UX Designer: Håvard Wullum

- Lead Programmer, Game Designer: Martin Knutsen

- Level, Game & UX Designer: Sebastian K Øie

3D Artist : Jørgen Sørensen & Victor Vefald

2D Artist: Alexander Sasha M. Thore

Music: Christian Alexander Espeseth
